responses.content: Party travelling Grey Plains to Khuzduk Hills, not at Seawatch/Riverwatch. ADV bullet not met.

state_changes.text: NPAG 25 Ilrym: Ironmask Agent Deryth @ Caras — fourth meeting with Conorth secured; presented forged trade route documents; Conorth interested but cautious; agent assessing whether to accelerate timeline

NPAG 25 Ilrym: Lithoe @ Khuzdukan — counter-sequence breakthrough achieved (trigger fired); viable sequence identified; testing on minor rune-chain fragment; Lalholm providing theological framework for soul-unbinding component

NPAG 25 Ilrym: Thordak Ironbrow @ Khuzdukan — tremors steady; ward-chamber secured; received Lithoe's breakthrough report; cautiously optimistic; preparing deep halls access for counter-sequence deployment
NPAG 25 Ilrym: Conorth @ Caras — reviewed Vael customs evidence; irregularities confirmed; ordered investigation into Golden Hind caravan routes; does not yet connect evidence to Ironmask operations
